caption.title: TEM observations of fibrils formed in the nuclei of cells infected with RVFV.
caption.p: The outline of an NSs filament within a cell nucleus is indicated in the left panel by red arrowheads. Higher magnifications (middle and right panels) reveal a substructure of NSs filaments, which are composed of bundles of parallel fibrils with estimated widths of 8â€“15 nm. Cyan arrowheads in the right panel indicate one fibril with a width of 10 nm.
